caller_intent: Sunny is relaying a message from Zeus about payment delays and discussing payment methods (checking account, card, or cash) for an outstanding obligation, while also mentioning a split payment arrangement with another party.
resolution_steps: Cody confirms acceptance of payment on Friday via checking account, card, or DFT setup.
Acknowledges Zeus's preference for cash on the first payment.
Requests Sunny to inform Zeus to call before arriving in case Cody is out of the office.
knowledge_required: Payment processing methods (checking account, card, DFT)
Handling partial payments and split arrangements
Client communication protocols for payment confirmations
summary: Sunny informs Cody that Zeus will pay on Friday, either via checking account, card, or DFT, with a note that the first payment may be cash. Cody requests confirmation from Zeus to call ahead if visiting. The conversation focuses on payment logistics and client coordination.
